channel.title: New player rights [508]
channel.description:
does anyone know how to add new player rights , i've got Already ------------ 0=player 1=mod 2=admin
i want to add owner and co-owner and shit
so 3=owner 4=co-owner Explain in detail please, maybe show to coding for it? thanks,

item.title: New player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“cocky, post:16, topic:343048”]I said doesn’t the server save something like: if prights=0 then… Or anything or :
prights:0=player
1=mod
2=admin
load character files to find…
Or anything like that, anywhere?[/quote]Yes. FileManager.java

It saves player rights inside their file.

Read full topic

item.title: New player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“cocky, post:12, topic:343048”]Ok, now, all the player rights have to be saved some where, dnt they?? Or else how doe the server know eat pright 0/1/2 is? Can u guys tell me where that is, and I’ll try going from there.[/quote]The server doesn’t care what the rights are, except for things like commands. Each players rights are saved in his file.

The client is the part that uses the rights and gives crowns etc.

Read full topic

item.title: New player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“cocky, post:10, topic:343048”]Dude, wen I do my prights to 3 in characters, wen I log in, I’m automatically 0… Because there is no pright 3![/quote]Correct, which is why I added the switch statement, so that if you DO set you rights to 3, it actually sends 2.

Read full topic

item.title: New player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:8, topic:343048”]ur base might not be pali but i will try my best(maybe)

open commands.java look for

            if (p.rights >= 2) {

after all commands in that add

if (p.rights >= 3) { }

under if(p.rights >= 3) { add ur commands lol its really simple tbh heres an example

if (p.rights >= 3) { if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equals("erand")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } }[/quote]You realize that in the 508 log in protocol the rights are sent to the client? To get the admin crown you send 2.

p.stream.writeByte(p.rights); //Sent right after return code

In order to add something like a hidden admin, you would replace that line with:

if(p.rights > 2) { switch(p.rights) { case 3: //Co-Owner p.stream.writeByte(2); break; case 4: //Hidden Admin p.stream.writeByte(0); break; } } else { p.stream.writeByte(p.rights); }
You could have as many as you want.
But you’d just need to change your commands file to accommodate the new rights.

Read full topic

item.title: New player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

ur base might not be pali but i will try my best(maybe)

open commands.java look for

            if (p.rights >= 2) {

after all commands in that add

if (p.rights >= 3) { }

under if(p.rights >= 3) { add ur commands lol its really simple tbh heres an example

if (p.rights >= 3) { if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equals("erand")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } }

Read full topic

that means u can add as many rights as u want ur rights can be 40 if u want[/quote]
Okay, then elaborate on how to implement one.
